slide1.title: About
slide1.text1: I studied design in my high school with good results. Then I did some work for some people until a small business was made.
slide1.text2: In the meantime, I did a lot of training, internships and work, I started to be interested in web-code, namely HTML, Javascript and CSS. I did two trainings within the context and how the design course further complemented my knowledge in the area of ​​web design.
slide1.text3: So I created this page in order to get to know me and know what I do.

card1.title: Graphic design
card1.body: Specialized course in logo creation. 1st Stage: F3 - Graphic Entity. 2nd Stage: Agir XXI - Social security service entity.

card2.title: Credit Card and Marketing
card2.body: Studies on Credit Cards and their presentation in marketing.

card3.title: Aerostructure Engineering
card3.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Vocational Training + OGMA
card3.body: Knowledge of drilling and driving parts for airplane assembly line. 500h Internship at OGMA.

card4.title: Associations and Youth
card4.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Professional Training
card4.body: Knowing how an association is created and knowing how to relate to young people. 420h Internship at Casa de Juventude de Alverca.

card5.title: Admnistrative technician
card5.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Professional Training
card5.body: Create document and organize these and know how to process complaints. 420h Internship at COPAM

card6.title: Administrative Technician - Human Resources
card6.body: Process documents and claim management in the company.

card7.title: Computing - Microsoft Academy
card7.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Professional Training
card7.body: Knowledge of computerization and Java, Html and CSS code.

card8.title: Web Programming
card8.body: Knowledge of SQL, C++/C#, Javascript, Html, Css and PHP with final project using everything learned.

services.title: Services
services.info: As a designer, I provide services that you can find below and can request as well.

logocard.title: Logos
logocard.descrition: Creation of custom logos for personal and corporate purposes, with finishing for wallpaper, letterhead, stamping and many others...

overlaycard.title: Orverlay Streaming
overlaycard.descrition: Streaming overlay customization for Youtube, Twitch, Facebook and many other streaming platforms, with alerts and goals.

feedback.beritech: Thank you for your work and patience, on my part and that of my colleague. We really enjoyed working with you and the work was 5★, we will sell more just because of the logo. Hugs and keep up the good work.

logo.title: Logos
logo.info: Here you will be able to know the steps by step how the process of this services is done and in the end you can request this same service.

step1.title: Interview
step1.text: I will ask a few short questions during the interview with the customer interested in the service. This procedure serves to understand about the requested product and to be able to demonstrate some research.

step2.title: Search:
step2.text: I do a lot of research on the topic of the client's requirement, for that same person to have an idea of ​​an idea that may come.

step3.title: Logo Sketches:
step3.text: The sketch is done by hand and when you have enough you will show the result and there may be a few more to come. In this part, who chooses which of the sketches is the client to advance to the large format and finally to digital format.

step4.title: Color Study:
step4.text: After passing the sketches to digital, a color study is carried out (if the client does not have the idea of ​​​​colors). I experiment with B/W, Red, Blue, Yellow, Green background so there are no problems with those colors that are used.

step5.title: Proportion:
step5.text: This step is used to make the appropriate measurements for the web format (namely: Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and many others...), large format wallpaper, print and many formats.

step6.title: Final:
step6.text: After all the steps, the final part comes, which is the delivery of documents. Where it will be stored in a zipped folder with the logo in .png, .jpg and .svg format. And you still get a .pdf of everything that was done.

overlay.title: Orverlay Streaming
overlay.info: Here you will be able to know the steps by step how the process of this services is done and in the end you can request this same service.
overlay.info2: Note: A mandatory logo is required for this service!

step1.title: Interview:
step1.text: I will ask a few short questions during the interview with the customer interested in the service. This procedure serves to understand about the requested product and to be able to demonstrate some research.

step2.title: Graphic Layout:
step2.text: Organization of the overlay space in 16:9 format (1920px:1080px resolution). Where each element will be located in each scenario.

step3.title: Background creation:
step3.text: From the logo I am able to create a suitable background and thus create a theme around the background. Or do it in an animated way with Adobe After Effects.

step4.title: Webcam:
step4.text: Customized customer webcam with 16:9 and 4:3 aspect ratio. And it can be animated or not.

step5.title: Alerts:
step5.text: Creating alerts with FreeCopyright Sound and can be done with animation or simple.

step6.title: Transition:
step6.text: Creating the unique transition for each overlay using Adobe After Effect.

step7.title: Chat Box:
step7.text: Creation of Chat Box to become more professional and have a very solid community.

step8.title: Test Phase:
step8.text: After all the creations, it's time to test the streaming program, Streamlabs and Streamelemntals.

step9.title: Final:
step9.text: After all the steps, the final part comes, which is the delivery of documents. Where it will be stored in a compressed folder with .png (for simple overlay) and .webm (for animated overlay) format. And you still get a .pdf of everything that was done and how to organize the elements.

projects.title: Projects
projects.info1: Here is the list of projects I've been working on lately, as a designer and programmer.
projects.info2: You can support me by becoming Patreons for my future projects.

project1.title: TEAM EAGLE: E-SPORT TEAM
project1.discription: This project started during the training I did as a final project. It was to serve as a group where I am to show what we were doing as content creators. But it took a different route and ended up being one for an Esports group. And this project contains several processes that reach the final conclusion and became a model to be used for various groups.
project1.discriptionCard: Full-Stock web page intended for use for a video game competition team. And this template can be used for future pagination.
